name: Activaire
description: Activaire is a boutique music curation company specializing in hospitality and luxury retail. Known for human-curated playlists and white-glove service, Activaire integrates with Q-SYS and other professional audio systems for high-end hotel and hospitality environments.
key_differentiator: Boutique, human-curated music design for luxury hospitality. White-glove service with Q-SYS integration for high-end hotel and retail environments.

name: Altaura
description: Altaura is a boutique sound agency specializing in bespoke music curation for fashion, luxury retail, and lifestyle brands. The company creates custom sonic identities and brand-specific playlists that reflect each client's unique aesthetic and positioning.
key_differentiator: Boutique sound agency focused on fashion and luxury brands. Creates bespoke sonic identities rather than off-the-shelf playlists.

name: Cloud Cover Music
description: Cloud Cover Music (Pandora CloudCover) provides Pandora-powered licensed background music for businesses. Offering curated stations selected by musicologists, the platform starts at $16.95/month with a 14-day free trial. Integrates with Q-SYS audio systems and includes the CloudBox media player.
key_differentiator: Pandora-backed with musicologist-curated stations. Most affordable entry point at $16.95/mo. Free 14-day trial with no credit card required.

name: Custom Channels
description: Custom Channels is a background music provider specializing in branded playlists and multi-location music management. Every playlist is human-curated by professional music designers, with songs screened for content and tagged with 170+ characteristics.
key_differentiator: Human-curated playlists with 170+ metadata tags per song. No AI curation — every playlist built by professional music designers.

name: Jukeboxy
description: Jukeboxy is an affordable background music and messaging platform for small and medium businesses, offering 40M+ licensed tracks starting at $24.95/month. The platform includes overhead messaging capabilities and simple multi-location management.
key_differentiator: Most affordable full-featured option at $24.95/mo with 40M+ tracks and built-in overhead messaging

name: Mood Media
description: Mood Media is the world's leading in-store media provider, offering background music, digital signage, scent marketing, AV systems, and overhead messaging. Formerly Muzak, the company serves over 100,000 businesses globally with a comprehensive suite of customer experience solutions.
key_differentiator: Largest global in-store media provider with 88+ years of industry heritage (Muzak legacy) and 100+ expert music designers worldwide
notable_clients: Gold's Gym, McDonald's, Burberry, Whole Foods Market, Abercrombie & Fitch

name: MTI
description: MTI is an in-store media provider offering background music, overhead messaging, and digital signage solutions for businesses. The company focuses on helping brands create consistent audio experiences across multiple locations with curated music programming and targeted messaging.
key_differentiator: Personalized service with direct account management and custom music programming for multi-location businesses

name: QSIC
description: QSIC is an AI-powered in-store audio platform that helps retailers monetize and measure in-store audio as a retail media channel. Founded in Australia in 2012, QSIC powers 7-Eleven's Gulp Radio across 12,000+ stores and reaches 100M+ shoppers monthly. Raised $25M Series B in January 2025 led by Hedosophia.
key_differentiator: AI-powered audio platform with patented ambient noise technology, closed-loop sales attribution, and AI-generated ad creative (Lucy). Powers 7-Eleven Gulp Radio across 12,000+ stores.

name: Rockbot
description: Rockbot is a streaming media platform for businesses offering licensed background music, digital signage, TV programming, audio messaging, and retail media advertising through one unified platform. Founded in 2009 and backed by Google, Rockbot serves nearly 50,000 businesses across North America.
key_differentiator: Single-platform solution for music, TV, signage, and advertising. Backed by Google. Interactive Rockbot Request feature lets guests request songs.
notable_clients: Planet Fitness, Walmart, Shake Shack, Ashley Furniture

name: SiriusXM for Business
description: SiriusXM for Business provides licensed commercial music through 240+ curated channels and 10,000+ Pandora stations. The service includes dedicated hardware players and is designed for businesses that want a simple, set-it-and-forget-it music solution.
key_differentiator: 240+ music channels and 10,000+ Pandora stations backed by the SiriusXM brand. Simple hardware-based setup with no internet dependency.

name: SoundMachine
description: SoundMachine is a commercial music streaming service providing over 61 million licensed tracks with multi-location management, advanced scheduling, and integration with Sonos, Crestron, and other professional audio systems. Known for deep customization and a modern tech-forward platform.
key_differentiator: Deep hardware integrations (Sonos, Crestron, Q-SYS) with 61M+ tracks and advanced multi-location scheduling controls

name: Soundsuit
description: Soundsuit is a German-based AI-powered commercial music service that uses artificial intelligence to curate and schedule background music for businesses. With 100M+ tracks and 500+ playlists, the platform automatically adapts music to time of day and business type.
key_differentiator: AI-powered music curation that automatically adapts playlists to time of day and business environment. European-based with strong international presence.

name: Soundtrack Your Brand
description: Soundtrack Your Brand is a Spotify-backed commercial music streaming platform that provides fully licensed background music for businesses. Known for strong UX and the largest commercially licensed music catalog, it offers on-demand track selection, custom playlist building, and multi-location management.
key_differentiator: Spotify-backed with the largest commercially licensed catalog. Only major platform offering true on-demand song selection and Spotify playlist import.

name: Stingray
description: Stingray is a Canadian public company (TSX: RAY.A/RAY.B) providing commercial music, digital signage, in-store audio advertising, and AI-driven consumer insights. Stingray Advertising is North America's largest retail audio advertising network, reaching 928M+ shopping visits monthly across 25,100+ locations.
key_differentiator: North America's largest retail audio advertising network with 25,100+ locations and 928M+ monthly shopping visits. Publicly traded with ~1,000 employees globally.

name: Vibenomics
description: Vibenomics is an in-store audio advertising and retail media platform that enables brands to reach shoppers at the point of purchase through programmatic audio ads. The company focuses on turning in-store audio into a measurable advertising channel for retail media networks.
key_differentiator: Programmatic in-store audio advertising platform focused purely on retail media monetization rather than background music
